title: Is We Dumb? | Tater Tots. Brad Pitt. Fridge. Jackknife.
description:
Did you know that Dan has been adding Brad Pitt to his guest list for last 20 years at every comedy show he's ever done? Let's talk about that, one of the most insane stories we have ever read on this show, destroying an entire house with a tiny hammer, how cool sonic booms are, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!  

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/UV9v6LjMeNs

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
